pr_title: Create Log Wrapper and Replace Base library logging

timeline.message: Create Log Wrapper and Repace Base library logging
Wrap Log.java and move base logging to DebugTool

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason for changing this from log.w to log.e?
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

timeline.message: Start moving android logs to DebugTool
refactor android classes to use DebugTool
Use new logInfo API instead of Deprecated API
Move android and base classes to new logWarning
Move JavaSE classes to use new logWarning
Move logError to new DebugTool APIs in android/base
Move JavaSE classes to use the new logError Apis

timeline.bodyText: This should have an actual TAG instead of null value
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi

replies.bodyText: I went through and added TAGs where I passed null throughout the code base
replies.author: RHenigan
